Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Bite Sized Investment - New 10 Year Lease

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The Easy T Centre is being expanded, providing opportunities for restaurateurs, gourmet food specialists and service business operators to lease space in a thriving easy-to-access, convenience-plus shopping and dining precinct in Robina.

One shop remains in the new nine-tenancy precinct with a strong focus on gourmet foods and outdoor dining that will comprise the ground level of a building that steps from two to four levels and whose upper storeys will accommodate 24 apartments.

The last remaining shop is 68sqm and includes a licensed alfresco area with bifold doors that seamlessly link the internal and external dining areas.

The Easy T Centre is anchored by an Aldi supermarket and includes an Amcal pharmacy, Zarraffa's Coffee, Network Video, Mrs Flannery's Natural Store, Brumby's bakery, and a Night Owl convenience store as well as a newsagency, health and beauty salon, restaurants, food and produce outlets and a standalone medical precinct.
Retail Area: 58-143 m2
Lease Type: Direct Lease

The Easy T Centre is designed for a busy lifestyle that demands convenience, freshness and choice without compromising on style. Its fresh open design will do much to create a welcoming environment and provide a positive shopping experience; along with over 290 on-grade car parks, excellent accessibility & traffic exposure to over 17,000 vehicles per day.

Anchored by Aldi, Easy-T provides over 35 specialty retailers with a strong mix of local & national tenants including Nightowl Convenience, Zarraffa's, Network Video, Amcal Pharmacy, trendy TukTuk Thai Restaurant, Subway and Krish Indian Restaurant just to name a few. Available tenancies include:

* Shop 18: 69sqm
Suitable for most retail uses

* Shop 3: 59sqm
Suitable for most retail uses

* Shop 28: 91sqm
Suitable for most retail uses

* Shop 30: 142sqm
Suitable for non food use only

For more information or to arrange an inspection please contact:

CBRE

Daniel Fenech - 0425 227 830 / daniel.fenech@cbre.com.au
